title: Coolie with Rain Coat, from a photography album with images of Japan
marks:
Inscription

LRC, in the negative: [B 95 COOLIE
description: portrait of a man with wrinkled, leathery skin, wearing a straw hat and a plant fiber cape-like garment; man holds a smoking pipe to his mouth and holds a wooden pole with rope at the end in his PR hand
creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
